verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> out of the <S%H5591>whirlwind<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Who is this that <S%H2821>darkeneth<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> by <S%H4405>words<s%> without <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>?
Gird <S%H247>up<s%> now thy <S%H2504>loins<s%> like a <S%H1397>man<s%>; for I will <S%H7592>demand<s%> of thee, and <S%H3045>answer<s%> thou me. answer: Heb. make me know

<S%H375>Where<s%> wast thou when I laid the <S%H3245>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>? <S%H5046>declare<s%>, if thou <S%H3045>hast<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%>. hast: Heb. knowest understanding
Who hath <S%H7760>laid<s%> the <S%H4461>measures<s%> thereof, if thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%>? or who hath <S%H5186>stretched<s%> the <S%H6957>line<s%> upon it?

Whereupon are the <S%H134>foundations<s%> thereof <S%H2883>fastened<s%>? or who <S%H3384>laid<s%> the <S%H6438>corner<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> thereof; foundations: Heb. sockets fastened: Heb. made to sink?
When the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3556>stars<s%> <S%H7442>sang<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, and all the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> for joy?
Or who shut <S%H5526>up<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> with <S%H1817>doors<s%>, when it brake <S%H1518>forth<s%>, as if it had issued <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H7358>womb<s%>?
When I <S%H7760>made<s%> the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> the <S%H3830>garment<s%> thereof, and thick <S%H6205>darkness<s%> a <S%H2854>swaddlingband<s%> for it,
And brake <S%H7665>up<s%> for it my <S%H2706>decreed<s%> place, and <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H1280>bars<s%> and <S%H1817>doors<s%>, brake: or, established my decree upon it

And <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5704>Hitherto<s%> <S%H6311><s%> shalt thou <S%H935>come<s%>, but no <S%H3254>further<s%>: and here shall thy <S%H1347>proud<s%> <S%H1530>waves<s%> be <S%H7896>stayed<s%>? thy: Heb. the pride of thy waves
Hast thou <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> since thy <S%H3117>days<s%>; and caused the <S%H7837>dayspring<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> his <S%H4725>place<s%>;
That it might take <S%H270>hold<s%> of the <S%H3671>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, that the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> might be shaken <S%H5287>out<s%> of it? ends: Heb. wings
It is <S%H2015>turned<s%> as <S%H2563>clay<s%> to the <S%H2368>seal<s%>; and they <S%H3320>stand<s%> as a <S%H3830>garment<s%>.
And from the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> their <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H4513>withholden<s%>, and the <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%> shall be <S%H7665>broken<s%>.
Hast thou <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H5033>springs<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>? or hast thou <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H2714>search<s%> of the <S%H8415>depth<s%>?
Have the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> been <S%H1540>opened<s%> unto thee? or hast thou <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H8179>doors<s%> of the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>?
Hast thou <S%H995>perceived<s%> the <S%H7338>breadth<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>? <S%H5046>declare<s%> if thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> it all.
Where is the <S%H1870>way<s%> where <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H7931>dwelleth<s%>? and as for <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, where is the <S%H4725>place<s%> thereof,

That thou shouldest <S%H3947>take<s%> it to the <S%H1366>bound<s%> thereof, and that thou shouldest <S%H995>know<s%> the <S%H5410>paths<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> thereof? to the bound: or, at, etc
<S%H3045>Knowest<s%> thou it, because thou wast then <S%H3205>born<s%>? or because the <S%H4557>number<s%> of thy <S%H3117>days<s%> is <S%H7227>great<s%>?
Hast thou <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H7950>snow<s%>? or hast thou <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1259>hail<s%>,
Which I have <S%H2820>reserved<s%> against the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6862>trouble<s%>, against the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7128>battle<s%> and <S%H4421>war<s%>?
By <S%H335>what<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> is the <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H2505>parted<s%>, which <S%H6327>scattereth<s%> the east <S%H6921>wind<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>?
Who hath <S%H6385>divided<s%> a <S%H8585>watercourse<s%> for the overflowing of <S%H7858>waters<s%>, or a <S%H1870>way<s%> for the <S%H2385>lightning<s%> of <S%H6963>thunder<s%>;
To cause it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>, where no <S%H376>man<s%> is; on the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, wherein there is no <S%H120>man<s%>;
To <S%H7646>satisfy<s%> the <S%H7722>desolate<s%> and <S%H4875>waste<s%> ground; and to cause the <S%H4161>bud<s%> of the tender <S%H1877>herb<s%> to spring <S%H6779>forth<s%>?
<S%H3426>Hath<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> a <S%H1>father<s%>? or who hath <S%H3205>begotten<s%> the <S%H96>drops<s%> of <S%H2919>dew<s%>?
Out of whose <S%H990>womb<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> the <S%H7140>ice<s%>? and the hoary <S%H3713>frost<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, who hath <S%H3205>gendered<s%> it?
The <S%H4325>waters<s%> are <S%H2244>hid<s%> as with a <S%H68>stone<s%>, and the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H8415>deep<s%> is <S%H3920>frozen<s%>. is: Heb. is taken

Canst thou <S%H7194>bind<s%> the sweet <S%H4575>influences<s%> of <S%H3598>Pleiades<s%>, or <S%H6605>loose<s%> the <S%H4189>bands<s%> of <S%H3685>Orion<s%>? Pleiades: or, the seven stars: Heb. Cimah Orion: Heb. Cesil?

Canst thou bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4216>Mazzaroth<s%> in his <S%H6256>season<s%>? or canst thou <S%H5148>guide<s%> <S%H5906>Arcturus<s%> with his <S%H1121>sons<s%>? Mazzaroth: or, the twelve signs guide: Heb. guide them
<S%H3045>Knowest<s%> thou the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>? canst thou <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H4896>dominion<s%> thereof in the <S%H776>earth<s%>?
Canst thou lift <S%H7311>up<s%> thy <S%H6963>voice<s%> to the <S%H5645>clouds<s%>, that <S%H8229>abundance<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> may <S%H3680>cover<s%> thee?
Canst thou <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H1300>lightnings<s%>, that they may <S%H3212>go<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto thee, Here we are? Here: Heb. Behold us?
Who hath <S%H7896>put<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> in the inward <S%H2910>parts<s%>? or who hath <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H998>understanding<s%> to the <S%H7907>heart<s%>?
Who can <S%H5608>number<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> in <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>? or who can <S%H7901>stay<s%> the <S%H5035>bottles<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, stay: Heb. cause to lie down
When the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H3332>groweth<s%> into <S%H4165>hardness<s%>, and the <S%H7263>clods<s%> cleave fast <S%H1692>together<s%>? groweth: or, is turned into mire: Heb. is poured
Wilt thou <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H2964>prey<s%> for the <S%H3833>lion<s%>? or <S%H4390>fill<s%> the <S%H2416>appetite<s%> of the young <S%H3715>lions<s%>, the appetite: Heb. the life
When they <S%H7817>couch<s%> in their <S%H4585>dens<s%>, and <S%H3427>abide<s%> in the <S%H5521>covert<s%> <S%H3926>to<s%> lie in <S%H695>wait<s%>?

Who <S%H3559>provideth<s%> for the <S%H6158>raven<s%> his <S%H6718>food<s%>? when his young <S%H3206>ones<s%> <S%H7768>cry<s%> unto <S%H410>God<s%>, they <S%H8582>wander<s%> for <S%H1097>lack<s%> of <S%H400>meat<s%>.
